title: Keeping time
creator_credit: Peter Roberts, Sirkka Konttinen, Lorna Powell and Amber Collective
brief_description: Integrates documentary footage and dramatised sequences in dealing with mother and daughter relationships. Particular reference is given to the influence of television on the family structure and shows how the mothers want their daughters to better themselves through the local dance studio.
